"The Monuments Men" is a World War II historical drama film directed by George Clooney. The movie tells the story of an unlikely group of men who are called to duty by the United States Army after they find out that their wealthy employer' s Ponzi scheme has collapsed.

"The Lucky Ones" is a comedy-drama film based on the novel of the same name written by Richard Ford. The movie tells the story of four different men who are all brought together in some strange way.

I hope you find these recommendations helpful.
